faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our customers
faq.a1: Delivery time depends on the chosen shipping company and the delivery person. We provide a detailed list of shipping options, prices, and delivery times on this page so you can easily verify them before ordering.
faq.a2: Currently, our shipping partner delivers within Algeria to all states and major cities.
faq.a3: The store offers bulk delivery service and for large orders, there's a discount of 10-15% on some products. You can contact us directly to inquire about quantities and discounts.
faq.a4: Products can be exchanged if they are in their original condition with original packaging, and only within two days of receipt. Please take a photo of the product and send it with your city, address, and order number to exchange it for another product if the product is defective, damaged, or doesn't match what was agreed upon.
faq.contactText: If you didn't find an answer to your question, you can contact our support team 24/7

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
content: Our website respects your privacy and seeks to protect your personal data.
This privacy policy explains how we collect and use your personal data (under certain circumstances). It also describes the procedures we follow to ensure the privacy of your information.

Protecting your data is very important to us. Your name and other information related to you will be used in accordance with this privacy policy. We will collect information when necessary or if it is directly relevant to our transactions with you.
You can browse the website without needing to provide any personal data. Your personal identity remains anonymous during your visit to the website and is not disclosed.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
content: We may need to collect your information if you wish to purchase a product from our website.

We collect, store, and process your data necessary to process your purchase from our website, to secure any potential claims that may arise later, and to provide you with our available services. We may collect personal information including, but not limited to, first name, last name, phone number, and delivery address.
We may provide your name and address to a third party to deliver your purchase (for example, a delivery person or supplier).

thirdParties.title: Third Parties
content: We may transfer your information to other companies in our group or to our agents and contractors to assist us in transactions related to the terms of the privacy policy. For example, we may use a third party to help us deliver products to you, receive payments from you, use it for statistics and marketing research, or assist the customer service team. We may need to share information with a third party to prevent fraud and reduce credit risks.

Your information may be disclosed to a third party without obtaining prior consent from you unless it is necessary for the purposes stated in this privacy policy, or if we are required to do so by law.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using the website

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: When visiting this website, the customer is considered to agree to the current terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, please refrain from using the website. The website administrators reserve the right to modify, update, add, or delete parts of the terms of use and conditions at any time. Changes become effective immediately upon publication on the website without prior notice. Please review the terms of use and conditions regularly to stay informed of any updates. Your continued use of the website after changes are published constitutes full acceptance of those changes.

siteUsage.title: Site Usage
siteUsage.content: To visit this website, you must be at least 18 years old or visit the website under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian.

ordersPricing.title: Order Approval and Pricing Details
content: Please note that in some cases, orders may not be accepted for various reasons. The website administrators reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason at any time. Before approving the order, you may be asked to provide additional verification information, such as phone number or address.

We strive to provide accurate pricing information to all users. However, errors may sometimes occur, such as incorrect product pricing on the website. Therefore, we reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order. In case of incorrect product pricing, we have the right, at our discretion, to contact you for instructions or cancel the order and notify you of the cancellation. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any orders, whether confirmed or not.

trademarks.title: Trademarks and Copyright
trademarks.content: All intellectual property rights, whether registered or not, related to the website, its content, and designs, belong to us. This includes all software works, source codes, and core programs. All website content is protected by copyright as a complete integrated work. All rights reserved.

jurisdiction.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: These terms and conditions are interpreted and applied according to the laws in force in the country. Accordingly, each party agrees to submit to the jurisdiction of the country's judicial bodies and waive any objections regarding venue.
